titleStmt.title: 1603. The vvonderfull yeare. Wherein is shewed the picture of London lying sicke of the Plague. ...
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.
N. L. (Nicholas Ling), fl. 1580-1607, printer.
Creede, Thomas, d. 1619?, printer.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Creede, and are to be solde in Saint Donstones Church-yarde in Fleet-streete.,

notesStmt.note: Printer's device of Nicholas Ling on t.p. Cf. McKerrow, Printers' & publishers' devices, no. 301.
Imperfect: pages cropped, with loss of print. Most of publication date on t.p. lacking.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
